price: Ni kama mfano wa walio kuwa kabla yao hivi karibuni. Walionja uovu wa mambo yao. Nao watapata adhabu iliyo chungu.
arabic: كَمَثَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ قَرِيبٗاۖ ذَاقُواْ وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهِمۡ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
footnotes: Mfano wa Bani Nnadhir ni kama mfano wa walio kufuru kabla yao karibuni. Hao walionja hapa hapa duniani matokeo ya ukafiri wao na kuvunja kwao mapatano. Na Akhera watapata adhabu ya uchungu mkali.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: kamathali alladhīna min qablihim qarīban dhāqū wabāla amrihim walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
